Text: The Sandy and Beaver Canal ran 73 mi from the Ohio and Erie Canal at Bolivar, Ohio, to the Ohio River at Glasgow, Pennsylvania.
Triplets:<The Sandy and Beaver Canal

--------------------
Text: Sandy and Beaver Canal:  It had 90 locks, was chartered in 1828 and completed in 1848.
Triplets:<Sandy and Beaver Canal
